ala aswanna nelima agosthu masa aarambha wi nowambar dakwa sidukarayi.shri lankawe paribhojanaya sandaha masakata arthapal metrik ton 12,000k awashya wana athara deshiyawa in nishpadanaya wanne siyayata 40k pamanak wana athara meratata arthapal nishpadanayen siyayata 65k waga karanuye badulla disthrikkayeni. 2013 wasare di arthapal, loku lunu, wiyali miris aanayanaya sandaha wayakara athi mudala rupiyal dasa laksha 19,104k bawa penwa dena aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya wasara 2015 awasanaya wanawita arthapal, loku lunu saha wiyali miris nishpadanayen siyayata 50ka swayanposhitha bhawayak labaganima rajaye aramuna bawada kiya.ebawin deshiya arthapal aanayanaya awama kirima sandaha aanayanika arthapalwalata wishesha bhanda baddak da rajaya mangin panawanu labiya.
